channel.title: Error in Java Console after joining my server
channel.description:
Well I got a new computer and I tried to log into my server with my owner acc. My silabclient freezes when I try to log in with a account which got a CROWN.
So if I log in with a normal random name which isn't used yet , it works till I tele home or something.
Here is the code in the Java Console.
[code] client.silabsoft.org Exception in thread "Thread-14" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at wc.a(wc.java) at dc.a(dc.java) at client.l(client.java) at client.A(client.java) at client.z(client.java) at client.G(client.java) at client.c(client.java) at a.run(a.java) at client.run(client.java) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2009, 08:55:49 am[/size][hr]Ah by the way .. The normal silab client works.

item.title: Error in Java Console after joining my server
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Java heap space ? Find it where ?

It’s a error in my java console. Not in a compiler or something.

Read full topic
